name: getProductsAsJson
setupQuery
func:
class Product {
  constructor(id,title,descr,price,unit,imageUrl,categoryKey,updatedAt,quantity,properties) {
    this.id=id;
    this.title=title;
    this.descr=descr;
    this.price=price;
    this.unit=unit;
    this.imageUrl=imageUrl;
    this.categoryKey=categoryKey;
    this.updatedAt=updatedAt;
    this.quantity=quantity;
    this.properties=properties;
  }
}
class Category {
  constructor(key,content,icon) {
    this.key = key;
    this.content=content;
    this.icon=icon;
  }
}
class ProductProperty{
    constructor(name,value){
        this.value=value;
        this.name=name;
    }
}

var ctr = 1;
function count(){
    ctr=ctr+1;
    return ctr;
}
var cats = [];
var prods = [];

cats.push(new Category('meat','Meat Products','sausage'));
cats.push(new Category('cheese','Cheese Products','cheeses'));
